Description: Have owned this Gibson, Les Paul Classic for over three years as an 'in home' recreational musical instrument. Recently had it serviced and restrung. It is in perfect working and cosmetic condition. Unfortunately over the past eighteen months because of work, I've had precious little time to play it. It's therefore sat on its' music stand in a smoke and pet free environment. The guitar comes with a correct Gibson hard shell case, also in mint condition. I will also throw in a small music stand. Buyer pays shipping from Zip code 91604. I will pay for safe, secure packaging and shipping insurance. Thanks for looking and good luck. On Jan-18-19 at 08:18:34 PST, seller added the following information: In an effort to answer a number of bidder questions, below please find some additional specs I picked up from the Gibson web site that references the GIBSON Les Paul Classic. Body Material - Mahogany Top Material - Maple Finish - Gloss Nitrocellulose Lacquer (Red) Neck - Mahogany Fingerboard - Rosewood Pickups - Burstbucker 61R (Zebra) Bridge - Burstbucker 61T (Zebra) Controls - 2 Push/Pull Volumes (Coil-Tap), 2 Push/Pull Tones (Pure Bypass/Phase) & Toggle Switch
Title: GIBSON Les Paul Guitar
Subtitle: A 'CLASSIC' model in mint condition
ConditionDescription: This Deep Cranberry Red GIBSON, Les Paul Classic Guitar is in perfect condition cosmetically as well as in perfect working order
